articles.title: ESTP-course in BI with Power BI
articles.description: Information about the ESTP-webinar on Power BI held on the 22.-24. april 2021.
articles.contents:
Contents
Introduction
1. Installation
1.2 Settings

2. Getting started
2.1 Videos


Introduction
This course/webinar is intended for newcomers to Power BI, who want to learn more about how to use a business intelligence tool like Power BI to visualize data. The course is also geared towards the type of data ususally seen in the production of official staistics.
1. Installation
The only prerequisite for attending the course is that you have Power BI Desktop installed on a computer that is at your disposal during the 3-day course. We will only use the Desktop-software, which is free, so there is no need to install anything more. PLease download the latest version.
1.2 Settings
We recommend to choose the following settings in Power BI desktop:
Set english as the language.

2. Getting started
2.1 Videos
This video gives you a nice introduction to what Power BI is:
